Posts.Content: I believe that they will ALWAYS do mammograms because they have to pay for the machines. Anyone know what one costs?? They're not going to put them out for the trashman; they Must pay for them! When a doctor refers someone for a mammo the staff at the hospital is grateful to him. Crass but true. Big Business is just that.
Posts.Title: Just got results from first mammo - am a little scared... 1 2
